T02D2982:51b-0: @51b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2982:51b-1: dri za'i gdon las thar bar 'dod pas /
T02D2982:52a-1: 'jug pa'i dus dang mtshan nyid brtags te yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis dang /
T02D2982:52a-2: mar ngo'i nyi shu bdun la 'jug / rtag tu glu gar la dga' ba dang /
T02D2982:52a-3: gtsang sbra che ba'i mi la 'jug ste /
T02D2982:52a-5: glu len cing gar byed kha nas rol mo'i sgra 'byin ;
T02D2982:52a-6: lto che zhing skom dad che /
T02D2982:52a-7: rgyan dang gtam la dga' ba ni dri za'i gdon gyis zin pas so //
T02D2982:52a-8: de las thar ba'i thabs ni khrus dang gtsang spra la gnas par byas la /
T02D2982:52a-9: me tog phreng ba dmar po chan dmar po'i gtor ma dang /
T02D2982:52a-12: skud pa dmar po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma mtshan mo sbyin no //
T02D2982:52a-13: de nas btsong dang tsha ba gsum dang /
T02D2982:52a-14: rtsa ba lnga po de sgog skya rnams ba mar
T02D2982:52a-15: phul bzhi dang ba gcin phul bzhi me chung bas
T02D2982:52a-16: btsos nas nad pa de la gos dmar po bskon
T02D2982:52a-17: te / kha zas dmar po byin la khrus bya /
T02D2982:52a-18: de nas snying po rgyas bsdus kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab nas /
T02D2982:52a-19: nad pa la snga ma ltar byin na /
T02D2982:52a-20: dri za'i gdon las thar bar nges so //
